name: swanky
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
informal (US also swank) very expensive and fashionable, in a way that is intended to attract people's attention and admiration: We stayed in a swanky hotel.
UK disapproving behaving too confidently: I'm sick of his swanky talk.
